questions.question_text: The King was embarrassed (A)/ to find evidence (B)/ against his own queen. (C)/ No error(D)
He waved us goodbye (A)/ as he boarded the train (B)/ which disappeared into the tunnel. (C)/ No error (D)
A small parcel (A)/ of novels is (B)/ better than none. (C)/ No error (D)
At the request of the Defence Attorney (A)/the Jury was called (B)/and their individual verdicts were recorded. (C)/No error (D)

options.text: At the request of the Defence Attorney
and their individual verdicts were recorded

questions.question_text: My brother goes (A)/ to the office (B)/ five-day week. (C)/ No error (D)
Slow and steady (A)/ wins the race (B)/ as the wise would say. (C)/ No error (D)
We often hear people say (A)/ that most human beings have not evolved (B)/or grow up enough to stick to truth or non-violence.(C)/ No error (D)

options.text: that most human beings have not evolved
or grow up enough to stick to truth or non-violence

questions.question_text: A time slot of fifteen minutes(A)/ are allowed(B)/ to each speaker.(C)/ No error (D)

options.text: A time slot of fifteen minutes

questions.question_text: Only one of the boys _____ not done the homework given yesterday.
His wife has a twin who resembles her so much that at first he had great trouble telling _____.
**_____** wants to succeed in life must be prepared to work hard.
Vinod, two of ___ brothers attend primary school, wishes to be a school teacher after his graduation from the University.
Our new digital photo-print machine, the manual **_____** is lost**,** awaits to be set up properly.
I have never seen _____ animal before.
As soon as we arrived in the dormitory we _____ our pullovers.
Remember _____ your temper even when provoked.
Difficulty after difficulty _____ in his way to success.
**Arise!** Our freedom is in danger.
One is _____ in duty to help the ageing parents.
Many a man (A)/ want to be (B)/ rich quickly. (C)/ No error (D)
We have **no less than** a thousand students in our College

options.text: We have not less than a thousand students...
We have no less than thousand students...
We have no fewer than a thousand students...

questions.question_text: **Many a man** would welcome the opportunity.
**English** opens the window upon the world's knowledge.
What **you have been doing** in the workshop since last month?
You are asked to copy this letter **word by word**.
**Riding upon his horse, the tiger jumped at him.**

options.text: Riding upon the tiger, the horse jumped at him.
The tiger jumped at him while he was riding upon his horse.
The tiger rode at him while he was jumping upon his horse.

questions.question_text: I did not see him **since he wrote last.**
**If I hadn’t seen the car coming,** I might have been killed.

options.text: If I had seen the car coming
When I hadn’t seen the car coming
Since I hadn’t seen the car coming

questions.question_text: The dictator **declared** an emergency in the country.

options.text: They left the hotel where they had been staying by car.
They left where they were staying in a hotel by car.
In a car they left where they were staying in a hotel

questions.question_text: The long-distance telephone lines **were cut out** due to the storm.

Our new digital photo-print machine is not working. I will have to look _____ a manual.

Decide which of the conclusions logically follows.
questions.data_paragraph:
Statement: Good voice is a natural gift but one has to keep practising to improve and excel well in the field of music.
Conclusions:
I. Natural gifts need nurturing and care.
II. Even though your voice is not good, one can keep practising.

questions.question_text: Decide which of the conclusions logically follows.
questions.data_paragraph:
Statement: All the organised persons find time for rest. Sunita, in spite of her very busy schedule, finds time for rest.
Conclusions:
I. Sunita is an organised person.
II. Sunita is an industrious person.

questions.question_text: Decide which of the conclusions logically follows.
questions.data_paragraph:
Statement: Double your money in five months – An advertisement.
Conclusions:
I. The assurance is not genuine.
II. People want their money to grow.

questions.question_text: Decide which of the conclusions logically follows.
questions.data_paragraph:
Statement: Company X has a record of manufacturing cameras of quality and the latest design so that you do not spoil even a single shot irrespective of the weather conditions.
Conclusions:
I. No other company except X is reputed in the camera industry.
II. Anyone can take an acceptable shot with camera X.

questions.question_text: Based on the statement, which conclusion necessarily follows? **I. Urban gardening is an effective solution to all systemic issues. II. Urban gardening's popularity has increased recently. III. There is a debate regarding the ultimate effectiveness of urban gardening in addressing fundamental problems.**
questions.data_paragraph: Urban gardening has gained traction in recent years... critics argue that urban gardening often does not address the systemic issues...

questions.question_text: Based on the statement, which conclusion necessarily follows? **I. All current AI systems are bias-free. II. Fairness and inclusivity are foundational goals in AI development.**
questions.data_paragraph: A fundamental principle of artificial intelligence (AI) development is to ensure that Al systems are designed with fairness and inclusivity in mind...

questions.question_text: Based on the statement, which conclusion necessarily follows? **I. The profound changes due to electricity were immediate. II. There is a division in opinion regarding the benefits of technological progress. III. The modern political movements mentioned are against technology.**
questions.data_paragraph: The discovery of electricity centuries ago led to profound changes... Some modern political movements propagate a narrative that portrays technological progress as inherently beneficial...

questions.question_text: Which of the following can be inferred?
questions.data_paragraph: The recent surge in demand for electric vehicles has led to increased lithium-ion battery production.

options.text: The increase in lithium-ion battery production is solely driven by the demand for electric vehicles.
Lithium-ion batteries are the only type of batteries used in electric vehicles.
Increased production of lithium-ion batteries will lead to a decrease in their cost.

questions.question_text: Selling a commodity at a price that is not more than that charged by competitors is
questions.data_paragraph: Most economists in the United States seem captivated by the spell of the free market... That each large firm will act with consideration of its own needs and thus avoid selling its products for more than its competitors charge is commonly recognised by advocates of free-market economic theories.

options.text: rejected by the free market system
opposed by the advocates of the free market theories
considered suspicious by the free market theorists
**recognised** by the advocates of the free market theories
